/home/kienpham/project/fpga_network/SimGrid-3.21/smpi_script/bin/smpicc   -g3 -std=gnu11   -O3 -funroll-loops -fno-strict-aliasing  -finline-functions  -fdebug-prefix-map=/home/kienpham/project/fpga_network/SimGrid-3.21=. -flto   -rdynamic CMakeFiles/macro-sample.dir/macro-sample/macro-sample.c.o  -o macro-sample/macro-sample  -Wl,-rpath,/home/kienpham/project/fpga_network/SimGrid-3.21/lib ../../lib/libsimgrid.so.3.21 -lm Boost::context -lpthread -lrt /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.so -lgfortran   -Wl,--as-needed -latomic -Wl,--no-as-needed
